value.title: Get the Image URL in Power BI Using Power Query Get Table from Example
value.excerpt: I have written previously a blog article that I explained in detail how I fetch the image URL from a website using Power Query. value.title: How to IMPORT data from a Power BI dataset   Premium only
value.excerpt: Get data from a Power BI dataset is creating a live connection, which is the recommended way because you will get the entire model. value.title: How to modify a linked entity in Power BI dataflows
value.excerpt: It is not possible to change a linked entity in a dataflow in Power BI. Linked entities has to be modified only in the dataflow in which they are created. However, sometimes, you need to do a small modification to the linked entity in a chained dataflow. There is a very simple trick, In this article

value.title: How to Use Time and Date Dimensions in a Power BI Model

However, I got some questions in the comments about how they will be used together in a data model. In this video, I’ll explain that. value.title: What is Premium Per User License for Power BI, and What is it good for

The report gives you an overall idea of how much the minimum, maximum, and average salary should be based on geo-location
